feed.title: Leed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Leed: Version 1.10.0 Stable
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • de3b566 Update MysqlEntity.class.php to bring compatibility with newer mysql (thank you @grimlokason for that) https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed/pull/497
  • 52a26c8 i18n JS translations extracted to translations.js.php for caching purpose
  • f45f698 Fix specialchars issue on title
  • Fix a lot of deprecated code for PHP8+ (thanks a lot to @Bagu for his implication on testing)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed/compare/v1.9.2...v1.10.0

entry.title: New release for Leed: Version 1.11.0 Stable
entry.content:
• 9682f18 SimplePie updated from 1.6.0 to 1.7.0
  • 34f2577 Fix translations.js.php

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed/compare/v1.10.0...v1.11.0

entry.title: New release for Leed: Version 1.12.0 Stable
entry.content:
⚠️ PHP 7.2+ is required ⚠️

  • 9f2d924239a6e616d31cf47ff98a819652d686c0 SimplePie library update (1.7.0 -> v1.8.0)

entry.title: New release for Leed: Version 1.13.0 Stable
entry.content:
• Shorten the "title" field to fit in the database by @Sbgodin in https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed/pull/504
  • OTP feature removed (security concerns and for PHP 8.1+ compatibility)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed/compare/v1.12.0...v1.13.0

entry.title: New release for Leed: Version 1.14.0 Stable
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updates to links & spelling corrections. by @vdbhb59 in https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed/pull/505
  • f2e6e12 0f03a24 0ffb5c8 a465c28 PHP 8.2 ready
  • 409a1ea [Boyscout] Remove duplicated array entry
  • 2ae9da0 Fix enclosure type when null
  • fa839a2 Opml export unused feedManager removed
  • 64507f9 Cookie posé avec la directive SameSite: Strict
  • 050e797 Marigolds: Fix description not loaded on complete entry display config
  • d9209bd Marigolds: useless empty divs removed
  • 1f34b82 Marigolds: event_share_actions hook added
  • 71630d2 Archived plugins not proposed from Github anymore

New Contributors

  • @vdbhb59 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed/pull/505

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed/compare/v1.13.0...v1.14.0
